summary: I PURCHASED A 1994 CHRYSLER NEW YORKER IN 1998.  EVERY SUMMER THE AIR CONDITIONING HAS FAILED.  A CHRYSLER TECHNICIAN INFORMED ME THAT THERE IS A PROBLEM WITH THE AIR CONDITIONING COMPONENT IN THE 1994 NEW YORKER.  I CONTACTED CHRYSLER CORP. TO INQUIRE IF THERE IS INDEED A PROBLEM, AND IF OTHER OWNERS HAD THE SAME PROBLEM  THEIR ANSWER WAS NO.  AFTER VISITING THE COMPLAINT SECTION OF THIS SITE, I SEE THAT IS NOT THE CASE.  DO I HAVE ANY RECOURSE AVAILABLE TO ME?
